rules_text:
Flying, deathtouch
As this creature enters, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, it enters as a copy of that card, except it has flying and deathtouch.
notes:
!tag promo
A control deck that plays many instant-speed answers until it can reanimate a big threat.
